name: Olof Fåhræus
obverse: Bust of Olof Fåhræus, in uniform, facing left.
obverse_inscriptions: OL. IMM. FÅHRÆUS CONSILAR. REG. N. 1796. O. 1884.
reverse: Wreath encircling inscription. A small star at bottom.
reverse_inscriptions: SOCIO SUO MERITISSIMO REG. ACAD. SC. SUEC. MDCCCLXXIX.
description: civil servant, politician, and entomologist mainly interested in Coleoptera.
Fåhræus was elected a member of the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences in 1840.
